name: Drawfighters
description:
What if your drawings came to life?
Get into the Drawfighters universe and live the unique experience of playing with your own creations!
In this epic turn based combat game, you will be able to draw your own fighters and use them in the battle thanks to Wildbit Studios’ RTSE technology.
Choose a team closest to your combat style among a large amount of creatures and a nearly endless set of unique skills. Will you find the winner team?
Fight against dangerous rivals and go for the final victory on the Great Tournament of the Three Volcanoes. Don’t hesitate any longer and unleash your hidden creative talents! Download the free mobile App (The Shaman of DrawFighters) or use the Book of the Magic Stones (www.drawfighters.com/fightingbook) to capture your creatures, and let the fights begin!
Do you dare?

1 player
2GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
